title: Agile soft template array fabrication of one-dimensional (1D) polyaniline nanocomposite fibers for hydrogen storage
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25347-25358
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04710A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ameena Parveen, S. Manjunatha, M. Madesh Kumar, Aashis S. Roy
The hydrogen adsorption capacity of polyaniline fibres is about 4.5 wt%, and 3 wt% PANI-Zn/V2O5 nanocomposite shows a high absorption capacity of 6.6 wt% compared with other compositions.
